dct_title_s: Caermarden, both shyre and towne described
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. "Cum privilegio." Inset: Caermarden. Shows hundreds and main roads. From: The theatre of the empire of Great Britaine ... / divided and described by Iohn Speed. London : And are to be solde by I. Sudbury and G. Humble, 1611.
dct_publisher_sm: [London], Are to be sold in popes head alley against the excha[n]ge by John Sudbury and George Humble, 1610.
